cnbc.title: Trump floats pulling licenses if networks are 'against' him after Jimmy Kimmel suspended
cnbc.summary: President Donald Trump has applauded the suspension of Jimmy Kimmel's late-night show over comments he made about the man accused of murdering Charlie Kirk.

cnbc.title: Intel surges 22% after $5 billion Nvidia investment, posts best day in nearly 38 years
cnbc.summary: Nvidia said it will invest $5 billion in Intel as part of a deal to co-develop data center and PC products with the troubled chipmaker.

cnbc.title: Nvidia just spent over $900 million to hire Enfabrica CEO, license AI startup's technology
cnbc.summary: In a deal reminiscent of acquihires by Meta and Google, Nvidia hired Enfabrica's CEO and other employees of the startup, and licensed its technology.

cnbc.title: David Letterman calls Jimmy Kimmel suspension 'ridiculous'
cnbc.summary: ABC pulled the "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" show off the air indefinitely over comments its host made about the alleged killer of Charlie Kirk.

cnbc.title: Netskope soars 18% on first day of trading, reaches $8.6 billion market cap
cnbc.summary: Netskope is the latest IPO debut amid a revival in market activity following a years-long drought

cnbc.title: Comcast spinoff Versant reports declining annual profit as it prepares to go public
cnbc.summary: Versant will trade on the Nasdaq under the ticker "VSNT" after its separation from Comcast.

cnbc.title: FedEx stock rises on better-than-expected earnings
cnbc.summary: FedEx beat on the top and bottom lines in its first fiscal quarter earnings report on Thursday.

cnbc.title: Oracle's Larry Ellison made his $365 billion fortune by breaking every rule of wealth management
cnbc.summary: Larry Ellison's fortune is built on mountains of leverage and risk, allowing him to borrow against his shares and raise cash without giving up control.

cnbc.title: How much homeowners pay in property taxes in every U.S. state—in one map

cnbc.title: Notion rides AI boom to $500 million in annual revenue, but Microsoft competition looms
